name: Inhabitance 0.1 Alpha
description:
This will be a mix of Settlers, Factorio and Stardew Vally where you occupy some land and build on it.

This early version has drifters looking for a place to stay, and some rabbits to give them a boost!

Click on the trees to collect wood (for now)

Click and place plots

Click the plots and Upgrade or Recycle!

This game is covered on my Twitch Stream on a Friday morning/afternoon 10AM-2PM GMT! https://www.twitch.tv/ramsayart
